channel.title: Pyroblaster on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Pyroblaster on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Flux Too Far
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton trying to get a scan of the Flux Bauble (or not).

item.title: A Peytonic Adventure
item.description: In this episode, an adventure in the 007 style in which Peyton is challenged by a world famous counterfeiter for a Chaotic match

item.title: An Easy Win
item.description: In this episode we’ll see how things can get really ugly when we try to take advantage of a rookie, right Peyton? ^_^

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City

item.title: Dangers of Diplomacy
item.description: In this episode we’ll see that it’s easier to get ants with honey than with vinegar, but that too much honey might not be a very good idea either

item.title: From the Deep (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, betrayal, brainwash, a military coup and the beginning of the end… Let the Invasion begin!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Losers' Circle
item.description: In this episode, Kaz is so psyched with his new scans from ancient Perim he decides to challenge every player who defeated him, thinking nobody would stand a chance… until his archenemy proves him otherwise.

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom

item.title: Out in the Cold
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s journey through a dangerous path, with an unusual guidance, to the aid of the reclusive Raimusa in the Crystal Range.

item.title: Raznus Returns
item.description: In this episode, a problematic excavation leads some Mandiblors led by Odu-Bathax and Raznus, former OverWorld Ambassador to the Danians, now Assimilated, to the basement of the Arsenal of OverWorld

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: The Birth of Borth-Majar
item.description: In this episode we will know the origins of an unusual creature, Borth-Majar, and how Kaz deals with his collective individually personality (what? O.o)

item.title: Threshold of Destruction
item.description: In this episode, once Dranakis Threshold’s secret leaked out, several players ported to ancient Perim, including Chaotic’s “Bonnie & Clyde”, who didn’t take long in conspiring with an old acquaintance, making of a painful event become, potentially, irreversible.

item.title: Triple Threat
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the Tribal Alliance overcoming its cultural differences so they united may have a chance against the M’arrillians

item.title: Warriors of Eternity
item.description: In this episode, Sarah is attacked by a Mipedian ghost and her friends, while searching for her, join a group of Mipedians who are searching for the legendary Owayki and his Stone Warriors, immune to the M’arrillian’s mind control
